data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
3I Infotech Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday February 13 2026 to inter alia consider and approve the Statements of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

Further in continuation to our disclosure on closure of Trading Window dated December 29 2025 pursuant to the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading by Designated Persons Trading window shall remain closed for all the designated persons and their immediate relatives till Sunday February 15 2026.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
pursuant to the Code of Conduct for the prevention of Insider trading by Designated Persons (the "Code")  the trading window for dealing in Securities of the Company shall remain closed for the Designated Persons and their immediate relatives as defined in the Code from January 1 2026  till the declaration of unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ending December 31 2025 and forty-eight hours thereafter.

The Date of Board meeting of the Company for declaration of unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ending December 31 2025 will be intimated in due course.

data.caption:
Intimation Of Receipt Of No-Objection Letter For Reclassification From Promotor And Promoter Group Category To Public Category Shareholders In Accordance With Regulation 31A Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And
Disclosur
data.news_body:
Further to our intimation dated August 05 2025 and August 06 2025 pertaining to receipt of request from IDBI Trusteeship Services Limited (ICICI Strategic Investment Fund) Promoter of the Company requesting its re-classification from promoter category to public category in accordance with Regulation 31A of SEBl LODR Regulations and submissions made by the Company in this regard for approval of the Stock Exchanges i.e. NSE and BSE for the said reclassificationwe are pleased to inform that the Stock Exchanges have granted no-objection for re-classification request dated August 05 2025 and approved our application today for reclassification in respect of the abovesaid promoter vide their letter dated September 02 2025

The approvals of the Stock Exchanges are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 31A Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated July 31 2025 regarding the re-classification of promoters we wish to inform you that the Company has submitted applications on August 5 2025 to BSE Limited and the National Stock Exchange of India Limited for obtaining their No Objection/approval for the proposed re-classification of ICICI Strategic Investment Fund which is part of the Promoter Group to Public category.
The said re-classification is subject to the receipt of requisite permissions sanctions and approvals as may be applicable.
Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated July 15 2025 intimating entitlement of 3i Infotech Inc. USA material subsidiary of the Company (US Subsidiary) to grant of USD 2144816.87 pertaining to employees retention credit. 

We have been notified by 3i Infotech Inc. USA material subsidiary of the Company (US Subsidiary) on August 5 2025 7:08 p.m. (IST) that US Subsidiary has received another intimation of overpayment dated July 7 2025 (received by it on August 4 2025) from Internal Revenue Service Department of Treasury Cincinnati USA along with payment instrument. Pursuant to this intimation US Subsidiary is entitled to an additional grant of USD 2260973.87 pertaining to employees retention credit as per Employee Retention Tax Credit Scheme. With this total grant entitlement under the Scheme stands at USD 4405790.74.

You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of The Meeting Of The Rights Issue Committee Of The Board Of Directors Of The Company
data.news_body:
3I Infotech Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 18/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is in furtherance to our disclosure on the outcome of the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company (Board) dated May 14 2025 intimating the Boards approval for fund raising of an amount not exceeding INR 100 Crores through issuing equity shares by way of Rights issue (Rights Issue).
We hereby inform you that a meeting of the Rights Issue Committee of the Board is scheduled to be held on Friday July 18 2025 inter alia to consider discuss and decide various matters in connection with the Rights Issue including specific terms of the Rights Issue such as draft letter of offer determination of Rights Issue size and price rights entitlement ratio etc.

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Companys website at www.3i-infotech.com.

You are requested to take the same on record.

USA material subsidiary of the Company (US Subsidiary) on July 14 2025 7:28 p.m. (IST) that US Subsidiary has received an intimation of overpayment from Internal Revenue Service Department of Treasury Cincinnati USA along with payment instrument. Pursuant to this intimation US Subsidiary is entitled to a grant of  USD 2144816.87 pertaining to employees retention credit as per Employee Retention Tax Credit Scheme. US Subsidiary is in process of evaluating the financial treatment of the said intimation and its impact on the financial results.

You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 (4) read with Para B of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that pursuant to opting the Direct Tax Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme 2024 (the Scheme) by the Company in respect of income tax litigations the material subsidiary company i.e. 3i Infotech Digital BPS Limited (formerly known as 3i Infotech BPO Ltd.) has received Certificate in Form 2 for Financial Year 2013-14 from the CIT TDS 2 Delhi.

The occurrence of event was July 03 2025 at 12:16 p.m.

data.caption:
In Furtherance Of Our Previous Disclosure Regarding The Receipt Of The Final Order In Form 4 From
The Principal Commissioner Of Income Tax On April 17 2025 (At 5:11 P.M.) For The Assessment
Year 2021-22 Which Resulted In A Refund Of ?4.49 Lakhs And Conc
data.news_body:
In furtherance of our previous disclosure regarding the receipt of the final order in Form 4 from
the Principal Commissioner of Income Tax on April 17 2025 (at 5:11 p.m.) for the Assessment
Year 2021-22 which resulted in a refund of ?4.49 lakhs and concluded the proceedings we
hereby inform you that the Commissioner of Income-tax (Appeals) Income Tax Department
vide its DIN and Order No. ITBA/NFAC/S/250/2025-26/1078038331(1) dated June 30 2025 in
the aforesaid appeal has issued an order stating that the said appeal is treated as infructuous
under Clause (2) of Section 4 of the Direct Tax Vivad se Vishwas Scheme 2024 and is
accordingly dismissed for statistical purposes.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading by Designated Persons (the Code) the Trading Window for dealing in Securities of the Company shall remain closed for the Designated Persons as defined in the Code from July 1 2025 till the declaration of financial results of the Company for the quarter ending June 30 2025 and forty-eight hours thereafter.
Date of the Board Meeting of the Company for declaration of financial results for the quarter ending June 30 2025 will be intimated in due course.
You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that Mr. Navneesh Sarin Business Head - Business Process Services (designated as Senior Management Personnel) has submitted his resignation from the services of the Company vide letter dated June 3 2025. Resignation Letter is enclosed herewith.

The Company has accepted his resignation and he will be relieved from his role at a mutually agreed date to ensure seamless transition. 

The requisite details pursuant to the SEBI Circular SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated November 11 2024 (SEBI Circular) is enclosed as Annexure - A.

You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
3I Infotech Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday May 14 2025 to transact inter alia following matters:
(i)To consider and approve the Statements of Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025; and
(ii) To consider the proposal for raising of funds by way of issue of equity shares on rights basis to eligible shareholders of the Company and other related matters.

Further in continuation to our disclosure on closure of Trading Window dated March 27 2025 pursuant to the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading by Designated Persons Trading window shall remain closed for all the designated persons and their relatives till Friday May 16 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Further to the intimation dated April 30 2025 in compliance with Regulation 30 and 47 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith copy of newspaper advertisements published today i.e. on Thursday May 01 2025 in Financial Express (English) and Mumbai Lakshadeep (Marathi) regarding dispatch of Notice of Postal Ballot to the Members of the Company.

This is for your information and records.

You are requested to take the same on record.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of Company3i Infotech Ltd
2CIN NO.L67120MH1993PLC074411
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY NA
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Varika Rastogi
Designation: Company Secretary
EmailId: compliance@3i-infotech.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Vaibhav Somani
Designation: Acting Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: compliance@3i-infotech.com

Date: 30/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.news_body:

Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) the Board of Directors of the Company
at their meeting held on January 29 2025 inter-alia considered and approved the following:

Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2024. along with Limited Review Reports thereon as per the prescribed format pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI Listing
Regulations;
The Board Meeting commenced at 4.30.p.m. and concluded at 5.20 p.m.
You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Statement Of Audited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI LODR'), this is to inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on May 9, 2022, has inter-alia approved the following:

(i) Statement of Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.

We are enclosing herewith a copy of the Statement of Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 along with Statutory Auditor's Report thereon as per the prescribed format pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR.

(ii) Appointment of Mr. Sanjay Rawa, as Chief Financial Officer of the Company effective from May 9, 2022 and cessation of Mr. Harish Shenoy, as Chief Financial Officer Designate of the Company with effect from May 9, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting - SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI LODR'), this is to inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on May 9, 2022, has inter-alia approved the following:

(i) Statement of Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.

We are enclosing herewith a copy of the Statement of Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 along with Statutory Auditor's Report thereon as per the prescribed format pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR.

(ii) Appointment of Mr. Sanjay Rawa, as Chief Financial Officer of the Company effective from May 9, 2022 and cessation of Mr. Harish Shenoy, as Chief Financial Officer Designate of the Company with effect from May 9, 2022.

data.caption: Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors ('the Board') of the Company at its Meeting held through video conference on November 08, 2021, has approved the Unaudited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021. Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the unaudited Financial Statements of the Company as per Indian Accounting Standards (INDAS) for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 along with Limited review Report thereon as per the prescribed format pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

The unaudited Financial Statements of the Company along with Limited Review Report will be made available on the Company's website www.3i-infotech.com.

The Board Meeting commenced at 2:30 p.m. and concluded at 08:00 p.m.

Kindly take the above on record and acknowledge receipt

Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the unaudited Financial Statements of the Company as per Indian Accounting Standards (INDAS) for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 along with Limited review Report thereon as per the prescribed format pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Unaudited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company, at its Meeting held through video conference on August 10, 2021, has approved unaudited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021. Unaudited Financial Statements of the Company along with Limited Review Report enclosed.
Other matters approved today-
1) Tuesday, August 31, 2021 has been fixed as the Record Date for the purpose of determining the shareholders whose shares will be reduced and consolidated pursuant to the Scheme of Arrangement between 3i Infotech Limited and its shareholders approved by Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench.
2) M/s. GMJ & Co. (FRN: 103429W) re-appointed as the Statutory Auditors of the Company for a second term of five years, subject to the approval of the Members of the Company.
3) The Board has designated Mr. Harish Shenoy as a Key Managerial Personnel of the Company as defined in SEBI LODR with immediate effect. The details are enclosed herewith as Annexure.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam,
We wish to inform you, pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we give the below schedule of Analyst/Institutional Investor meet for your information.
Date Type of Interaction Interaction with Company Representative
06-07-2021 MS Teams Call (One on one) Voyager Capital Thompson Gnanam
(Managing Director & Global CEO)
Mrinal Ghosh
(Chief Financial Officer)
Priya Goutham
(Chief Marketing Officer)

The discussion was mainly on the company and does not involve any unpublished price sensitive information.
Appended below please find the link to the audio of the call - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1TovxpQyYmIQpx8jLdKwIHEgOekAttWNM?usp=sharing
Due to delay in receipt of the audio call recording, the link of which is given above, we are submitting this intimation today.

data.caption: Revised Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Apropos the captioned subject, we enclose herewith the revised file of Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 ('Financial Results') after inserting the note in notes to accounts as per Regulation 33 (3)(e ) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The same was omitted due to an oversight in the results which was submitted on May 17, 2021.
We would further like to inform you that due to some typographical errors, some of the figures as appearing in the results filed on 17th May 2021 are not matching with the actual figures which were presented to and approved by the Board in the meeting held on 17 May 2021. These figures pertain to 'Quarter ended 31.03.2021',
We have inserted the revised figures in the results which are being uploaded with this letter. Please note that these errors do not have any impact on the Annual results for the year ended 31.03. 2021.
Request you to take this letter on record.
